articles.title: This art exhibition is 'divisive' or 'eye-opening' — it depends who you ask - NPR
articles.description: A new White House executive order says the exhibition is an example of how the Smithsonian portrays "American and Western values as inherently harmful and oppressive."
articles.content:
On any given day, there are hundreds of different exhibitions on view at the Smithsonian's many museums. But a recent White House executive order singled out one.
The Shape of Power: Stories of Race… [+4477 chars]
